meanings.definition: A chemical group derived from an alcohol by removal of a hydrogen atom from the hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The alkoxy in the molecule plays a crucial role in its reactivity.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemists often work with alkoxys in their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The alkoxy group decided to leave the alcohol party early.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like an alkoxy, adding a unique touch to everything she did.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant alkoxy stood out among the other functional groups.
